title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-584)
description: On September 10, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.3.2, 18.2.6 and 18.1.6
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.3.2, 18.2.6 and 18.1.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
